memory: To achieve the mission, I plan to go to the green key location first, which is located at (4, 3), and pick it up. Then, I will use the key to unlock the door, if there is one, and head towards the purple box. I will adjust my route according to the environment and the location of the purple box.

To achieve the mission, I plan to go to the green key location first, which is located at (4, 3), and pick it up. Then, I will head towards the green locked door at (5, 4) and use the key to unlock it. After unlocking the door, I will go through it and pick up the purple box to achieve the mission.
